Compute bootstrap model coefficients for BEAM

Source: R/compute_beam_stats.R
compute_beam_stats.Rd

Compute bootstrap model coefficients for BEAM

Usage

compute_beam_stats(beam.data, beam.specs, stdize = TRUE)

Arguments

beam.data

Result of prep.beam.data

beam.specs

A data.frame of strings with columns name, mtx, mdl (string with R model with mtx.row)

stdize

Logical whether to standardize (center and scale) predictors or not. Default is TRUE.

Value

A beam.stats object, which is a list with beam.stats (the association matrices), the beam.specs, and the beam.data

Examples

# \donttest{
data(clinf)
data(omicdat)
data(omicann)
data(setdat)
test.beam.data <- prep_beam_data(main.data=clinf, mtx.data=omicdat,
                                 mtx.anns=omicann, set.data=setdat,
                                 set.anns=NULL, n.boot=10, seed=123)
#> Checking inputs: Fri Jul 12 18:34:46 2024
#>   Checking that each element of mtx.data is a matrix: Fri Jul 12 18:34:46 2024
#>   Checking that each element of mtx.anns is a data.frame: Fri Jul 12 18:34:46 2024
#> Aligning main.data with each mtx.data: Fri Jul 12 18:34:46 2024
#>   Working on mtx.data Lesion (1 of 2): Fri Jul 12 18:34:46 2024
#>   Working on mtx.data RNA (2 of 2): Fri Jul 12 18:34:46 2024
#> Warning: Some ids not matched; returning NAs for those.
#>   Working on mtx.anns: Fri Jul 12 18:34:46 2024
#>   Matching matrix 1 with annotations: Fri Jul 12 18:34:46 2024
#>   Matching matrix 2 with annotations: Fri Jul 12 18:34:46 2024
#>   Checking set.data: Fri Jul 12 18:34:46 2024
#>     Ordering and indexing set.data: Fri Jul 12 18:34:46 2024
#>     Checking section 1 of 40 of set.data: Fri Jul 12 18:34:46 2024
#> Generating bootstrap index matrix: Fri Jul 12 18:34:46 2024
#> Packaging and returning result: Fri Jul 12 18:34:46 2024
specs <- prep_beam_specs(beam.data=test.beam.data,
                         endpts=c("MRD29", "EFS", "OS"),
                         firth=TRUE)
#> MRD29 is continuous, fitting lm
#> EFS is survival endpoint, fitting coxphf2
#> OS is survival endpoint, fitting coxphf2
test.beam.stats <- compute_beam_stats(beam.data=test.beam.data,
                                      beam.specs=specs, stdize=TRUE)
#> Working on analysis 1 of 6 : Fri Jul 12 18:34:46 2024
#> Lesionlm(MRD29~mtx.row,data=main.data,model=T)
#>   Working on bootstrap 0 of 11 : Fri Jul 12 18:34:46 2024
#>   Working on bootstrap 10 of 11 : Fri Jul 12 18:34:46 2024
#> Working on analysis 2 of 6 : Fri Jul 12 18:34:46 2024
#> RNAlm(MRD29~mtx.row,data=main.data,model=T)
#>   Working on bootstrap 0 of 11 : Fri Jul 12 18:34:46 2024
#>   Working on bootstrap 10 of 11 : Fri Jul 12 18:34:46 2024
#> Working on analysis 3 of 6 : Fri Jul 12 18:34:46 2024
#> Lesioncoxphf2(EFS~mtx.row,data=main.data,model=T)
#>   Working on bootstrap 0 of 11 : Fri Jul 12 18:34:46 2024
#>   Working on bootstrap 10 of 11 : Fri Jul 12 18:35:01 2024
#> Working on analysis 4 of 6 : Fri Jul 12 18:35:03 2024
#> RNAcoxphf2(EFS~mtx.row,data=main.data,model=T)
#>   Working on bootstrap 0 of 11 : Fri Jul 12 18:35:03 2024
#>   Working on bootstrap 10 of 11 : Fri Jul 12 18:35:20 2024
#> Working on analysis 5 of 6 : Fri Jul 12 18:35:22 2024
#> Lesioncoxphf2(OS~mtx.row,data=main.data,model=T)
#>   Working on bootstrap 0 of 11 : Fri Jul 12 18:35:22 2024
#>   Working on bootstrap 10 of 11 : Fri Jul 12 18:35:36 2024
#> Working on analysis 6 of 6 : Fri Jul 12 18:35:38 2024
#> RNAcoxphf2(OS~mtx.row,data=main.data,model=T)
#>   Working on bootstrap 0 of 11 : Fri Jul 12 18:35:38 2024
#>   Working on bootstrap 10 of 11 : Fri Jul 12 18:35:54 2024
# }
data(beam_dat_sm)
data(beam_specs_sm)
test.beam.stats <- compute_beam_stats(beam.data=beam_dat_sm,
                                      beam.specs=beam_specs_sm, stdize=TRUE)
#> Working on analysis 1 of 2 : Fri Jul 12 18:35:56 2024
#> Lesionlm(MRD29~mtx.row,data=main.data,model=T)
#>   Working on bootstrap 0 of 3 : Fri Jul 12 18:35:56 2024
#> Working on analysis 2 of 2 : Fri Jul 12 18:35:56 2024
